front.court: HIGH COURT OF GUJARAT AT AHMEDABAD
front.notes:
1. Whether Reporters of Local Papers may be allowed
: YES
to see the judgements?
2. To be referred to the Reporter or not?
: NO
3. Whether Their Lordships wish to see the fair copy
: NO
of the judgement?
4. Whether this case involves a substantial question
: NO
of law as to the interpretation of the Constitution
of India, 1950 of any Order made thereunder?
5. Whether it is to be circulated to the Civil Judge?
: NO
front.extra:
for Respondent No. 1 to 4.

MR.JUSTICE J.R.VORA
Date of decision:

(A.K.Trivedi,J.)
Heard learned A.P.P. Mr. D. N. Patel for the
appellant no.1-State of Gujarat and learned Advocate Mr.
Amit J. Shah for the appellant no.2-CBI, Gandhinagar
while Sr. Advocate Mr. Arun H. Mehta for the respondents
